get.description: To get the List of ASAP apps

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: To get the active launcher and inactive launcher

isAgentTransfer.descrption: Is this chat should have the capability to transfer to the agent

botId.descrption: Bot or Widget Id for chat or embed scripts. Mostly used for bots which are integrated with ZohoDesk such as GC and Answer bots.

displayName.descrption: display name of the module (chosen by user)

status.descrption: status of the module in this asap bot

defaultWelcomeMessages.introMessage: J'espre que cette application vous aidera 24h/24 et 7j/7
